rubrics.requirements: Core System Architecture: Dual-component design separating Unity simulation environment from Python training framework with standardized communication protocol

sub_tasks.requirements: Unity Simulation Environment: C# runtime for agent interaction, data collection, and inference execution
Agent Component System: Fundamental entities managing perception, decision-making, and action execution within simulation
Observation Processing Pipeline: Multi-modal sensor system for environmental data collection and preprocessing
Sensor Abstraction Framework: Modular ISensor interface supporting vector, visual, raycast, grid, and variable-length observations
Data Normalization and Encoding: Pre-processing system with stacking, one-hot encoding, and tensor-compatible serialization
Multi-Camera Visual Integration: Simultaneous processing of multiple visual inputs with convolutional network support
Action Execution System: Motor control interface translating neural network outputs into environment actions
Actuator Abstraction Framework: Modular IActuator interface for continuous and discrete action space execution
Action Space Management: Support for continuous force control and discrete choice actions with dynamic masking
Agent Lifecycle Management: Episode initialization, termination handling, heuristic fallback, and max-step capping
Multi-Agent Coordination: Group behavior system supporting cooperative teams and adversarial scenarios
Cooperative Group Management: Shared reward systems encouraging collaborative behavior
Adversarial Team Assignment: Dynamic team formation for competitive multi-agent training
Inference Engine: Cross-platform neural network execution system within Unity
Model Embedding and Execution: ONNX model integration with Barracuda backend for CPU/GPU/mobile deployment
Cross-Platform Determinism: Consistent inference results across different hardware targets
Environment Management: Simulation lifecycle control and parameterization system
Academy Singleton: Global time-stepping, fixed-interval control, and scene-wide parameter management
Environment Parameterization: Dynamic configuration system for curriculum learning and domain randomization
Python Training Framework: Machine learning orchestration system managing algorithms, optimization, and distributed training
Training Orchestration System: Command-line interface managing complete training lifecycle
Session Management: Training run control with checkpoint saving, resumption, and graceful shutdown
SubprocessEnvManager: Parallel Unity environment coordination for accelerated data collection
Multi-Algorithm Training Framework: Pluggable system supporting reinforcement learning and imitation learning approaches
Deep Reinforcement Learning Algorithms: Policy gradient and value-based methods for autonomous learning
Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO): On-policy algorithm with GAE, entropy bonus, and learning rate annealing
Soft Actor-Critic (SAC): Off-policy algorithm with twin Q-functions and automatic temperature tuning
Multi-Agent POCA: Centralized critic with decentralized execution for cooperative heterogeneous agents
Imitation Learning Framework: Learning from demonstrations through behavioral cloning and adversarial methods
Behavioral Cloning: Direct policy learning from expert demonstrations with L2 loss
Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning (GAIL): Adversarial approach without explicit reward engineering
Neural Network Architecture System: Flexible model construction with specialized components and memory integration
Visual Encoding Networks: CNN architectures with GroupNorm, IMPALA residual blocks, and configurable filters
Attention Mechanisms: Transformer blocks for variable-length and structured input processing
Memory-Enhanced Networks: LSTM/GRU integration for temporal reasoning and partial observability
Model Export Pipeline: TorchScript to ONNX to Barracuda conversion for Unity deployment
Reward Signal Composition System: Multi-source reward aggregation combining extrinsic and intrinsic motivation
Intrinsic Motivation Framework: Self-generated rewards for exploration enhancement
Curiosity-Driven Exploration (ICM): Prediction error-based rewards for novel state discovery
Random Network Distillation (RND): Feature-based exploration for sparse reward environments
TorchOptimizer Framework: PyTorch-based optimization with gradient clipping, mixed precision, and distributed support
Unity-Python Communication Protocol: Bidirectional RPC system with protobuf serialization and step-wise synchronization
BaseEnv Interface: Python abstraction providing step(), reset(), and behavior specification methods
Communication Layer Components: Socket-based client-server architecture with version handshake
UnityCommunicator: C# server packaging DecisionSteps/TerminalSteps with engine configuration
RpcCommunicator: Python client handling async I/O and protobuf to numpy translation
Side Channel System: Parallel communication for auxiliary data outside main observation-action loop
System-Level Channels: Built-in channels for engine configuration and environment parameters
Custom Channel Framework: User-extensible bidirectional data streams with runtime registration

rubrics.requirements: Advanced Training Strategies: High-level methodologies for complex problem solving and robust policy development

sub_tasks.requirements: Self-Play Training System: Competitive learning where agents train against evolving versions of themselves
ELO Rating and Opponent Selection: Skill assessment mechanism for balanced competitive training
Policy Snapshot Management: Historical policy preservation with swap-probability curriculum
Curriculum Learning Framework: Progressive difficulty adjustment for complex skill acquisition
Performance-Based Progression: Automatic advancement based on agent competency metrics with JSON-defined thresholds
Multi-Stage Task Decomposition: Complex task breakdown into learnable sub-skills
Environment Parameter Randomization: Domain randomization for robust policy generalization
Statistical Sampling Framework: Configurable parameter distributions including uniform, Gaussian, and multi-range samplers
Adaptive Parameter Control: E-Greedy bandit balancing exploration vs exploitation of environment parameters

rubrics.requirements: Configuration and Monitoring System: Declarative training specification and performance analysis infrastructure

sub_tasks.requirements: YAML Configuration Framework: Declarative system for defining training runs, hyperparameters, and reward signals
Behavior-Specific Configuration: Mapping trainer settings to specific agent behaviors with algorithm selection
Training Monitoring and Visualization: Statistics collection and real-time performance tracking
TensorBoard Integration: Automatic logging of rewards, policy loss, entropy, and custom metrics
StatsWriter Plugin System: Extensible statistics aggregation with pluggable output formats

rubrics.requirements: Extensibility and Integration Ecosystem: Plugin architecture and external framework compatibility

sub_tasks.requirements: Plugin Architecture: Entry-point system for custom trainers, optimizers, and specialized components
Custom Trainer Plugin System: Framework for implementing novel training algorithms
Custom StatsWriter Extensions: Pluggable statistics export beyond TensorBoard
External Framework Integration: Compatibility layers for popular ML frameworks and research platforms
OpenAI Gym Wrapper: Single-agent interface with action flattening and dtype conversion
PettingZoo Integration: Multi-agent AEC and parallel APIs with agent lifecycle management
Hugging Face Hub Integration: Model sharing with automatic metadata and README generation
Cloud and DevOps Infrastructure: Distributed training support with containerization and cloud platform integration
